name: Anger Issues
description:
This game is a submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

  • WASD/Arrows - MOVE
  • Space - SHOOT
  • Shift - RELOAD

You're an agent of the SSF (Slime Shooter Force) but everyone on the field knows you have some anger issues. Try to keep calm while you shoot as many monsters as you can, because if you get angry, you'll soon be OUT OF CONTROL ;)

IMPORTANT NOTES :

You can reload only when you are low on munitions. 

When you're angry, you have infinite ammo, so shoot in all directions !
